GSD.description:
btrfs: fix race between quota enable and quota rescan ioctl

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.75 by commit 4b996a3014ef014af8f97b60c35f5289210a4720. For more details please see the references link.
